mapper.update: UPDATE biz_laundry bl INNER JOIN ( SELECT sum( 1 ) total_num, sum( CASE WHEN activated = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) activated_num, laundry_id FROM biz_wardrobe WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY laundry_id ) c ON bl.id = c.laundry_id SET bl.wardrobe_num = c.total_num, bl.activated_wardrobe_num = c.activated_num WHERE 1 =1
